name: tryon
description: Virtual try-on: swap clothing on avatar while preserving identity

studio_v1.base_prompt: Replace onsie with the reference clothing items.

style.lighting: consistent with original avatar lighting, soft studio illumination
style.garment_rendering: realistic fabric texture, natural draping, accurate fit to body
style.quality: high-end fashion editorial, seamless clothing integration

identity_preservation.instructions: Keep exact same face, hair, skin tone, body shape, and pose as the avatar
identity_preservation.negative: do not modify face, do not change body proportions, do not alter pose

garment_instructions.fit: clothing fits naturally on the body, proper sizing
garment_instructions.physics: realistic fabric behavior, natural folds and creases
garment_instructions.integration: seamless blend between garment and body, no floating edges

style.lighting: bright, even lighting to showcase garment details
style.garment_rendering: clear visibility of garment features, accurate colors

garment_instructions.fit: showcase how garment fits on body

clothing_description.description: Description of clothing items to apply

negative_prompt: wrong clothing, misaligned garment, floating clothes, unrealistic fit, distorted body, changed face, different person, blurry, low quality, deformed limbs, bad anatomy
